TopicTitle: How do I export TUFX profiles?

Articles.Content: The TUFX mod says that it saves the profiles to ksp.log, but I don't know where it is. I checked my logs folder and I couldn't find anything related to TUFX. I checked the actual TUFX folder for anything, but it failed. I really don't want to redo the TUFX profiles each time I load back into ksp. Was I supposed to do something or am I missing something?

1 hour ago, Tony Duhon said:

The TUFX mod says that it saves the profiles to ksp.log, but I don't know where it is. I checked my logs folder and I couldn't find anything related to TUFX. I checked the actual TUFX folder for anything, but it failed. I really don't want to redo the TUFX profiles each time I load back into ksp. Was I supposed to do something or am I missing something?

Edit:
The profile-Settings are saved in your savegame (\Kerbal Space Program\saves\YourSaveGame\persistent.sfs).

Quote

    {
            WarningLabel =
            FlightSceneProfile = Default-Flight
            MapSceneProfile = Default-Flight
            EditorSceneProfile = Default-Editor
            SpaceCenterSceneProfile = Default-KSC
            TrackingStationProfile = Default-Tracking
        }

 

Edited July 28, 2023 by Cheesecake

1 hour ago, Cheesecake said:

I don't think the profile is saved in the log because it is overwritten at every start. Probably the ModuleManager.ConfigCache was meant here. There is also an entry for TUFX and the profile.

Turns that I do it by manually editing the TUFX-Default.cfg file

Thank you for the help though!

Edited July 28, 2023 by Tony Duhon
